Subjects were adolescents aged 13-18 years who experienced a Syi’ah-Sunni conflict in Sampang. There are three research subjects in accordance with the criteria of the study, namely NS, AS, and SN. Data were analyzed based on qualitative analysis of Miles and Huberman to perform data reduction, data presentation, and drawing conclusions. From the analysis of the data obtained showed that there is a picture that shows the resilience that all subjects have the characteristics and factors that affect the achievement of resilience with different levels. Subject NS has high resilience, because of all the characteristics and factors that affect the achievement of resilience possessed by the subject first. While the subject of the United States have a degree of resilience that is, due to factors affecting the achievement of resilience only includes two factors only, namely factors within and external support factors. Subjects did not have the interpersonal factors, where the subject cannot control emotions. Furthermore, SN subjects have low resilience, because the subject does not have the characteristics, insight, relationships, and initiatives. Subjects did not have the support of interpersonal factors, where the subject cannot control emotions. Subject also has a quiet nature, so it cannot adapt well.

Keywords:	Resilience, Adolescent, Syi’ah-Sunni, Conflict, Victims, Sampang, Madura

judul:
AKTUALISASI DIRI REMAJA KORBAN SCHOOL BULLYING PADA 
SISWA KELAS VII SMP AL-HIKAM TUNJUNG BURNEH BANGKALAN
abstrak id:
Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk untuk mengetahui aktualisasi diri remaja yang menjadi korban school bullying. Bagaimana aktualisasi diri remaja setelah menjadi korban bullying. Subjek dalam penelitian ini adalah tiga subjek penelitian yang merupakan siswa kelas VII SMP Al-Hikam Tunjung Burneh Bangkalan. Tiga subjek ini merupakan siswa yang menjadi korban bullying. Dalam penelitian  ini didapatkan hasil bahwa siswa yang menjadi korban bully mengalami kesulitan untuk dapat mengaktualisasikan dirinya. Aktualisasi diri remaja dalam hal ini belum dapat terpenuhi dengan baik karena adanya beberapa faktor yang disebabkan dari perilaku bully yang diterima dari orang lain/siswa lain. Faktor tersebut  berasal dari dalam diri individu, berasal dari luar, dan berasal dari pengaruh negatif. Faktor yang berasal dari diri individu berupa ketakutan dan keraguan individu untuk memunculkan potensi-potensi unik yang ada dalam dirinya. Individu gagal untuk mengaktualisasikan dirinya karena saat individu berusaha untuk menunjukkan potensi dirinya, justru hal itulah menjadi boomerang bagi individu sehingga menjadi korban bully. Faktor yang ketiga adalah berasal dari pengaruh negatif. Ketakutan-ketakutan dan kecemasan individu akan perilaku bully membuat individu terkungkung akan kebutuhan rasa aman. Sehingga mendorong individu untuk mundur pada pemenuhan akan rasa amannya. Faktor-faktor tersebut sangat berpengaruh terhadap terpenuhinya kebutuhan aktualisasi diri remaja.
Kata kunci : bullying, aktualisasi diri, remaja
abstrak en:
This research aims to determine self-actualization For adolescent who are victims of school bullying. How adolescent self-actualization after being bullied. Subjects in this research were used three research subjects who are Seventh Grade students of Junior High School  Al-Hikam Tunjung Burneh Bangkalan. The three subjects are students who are being bullied. In this research showed that students who are victims of bullies may find it difficult to actualize himself. Self-actualization of adolescent in this case can not be fulfilled properly due to several factors resulting from the behavior of the bully received from another person / other students. These factors come from within the individual, comes from outside, and comes from negative influences. Factor derived from the individual self is fear and doubts individual to bring a unique potential that exists within him. Individuals failing to actualize themselves as individuals while trying to show her potential, this would be a boomerang for individuals that are victims of bullying. The third factor is derived from negative influences. and anxiety individual fears will make individuals confined bully behavior will need a sense of security. Thus encouraging individuals to quit the fulfillment Need of safety. These factors greatly affect the fulfillment of self-actualization needs of teenage.
Key word : Bully, self-actualization, adolescent.

judul: HUbungan antara Kecenderungan Gaya Hidup Hedonis dengan Perilaku Konsumtif pada Komunitas Hijabi Madura (Komunitas Hijabers Pamekasan)
abstrak id:
SITI MAGHFIRAH, 100541100068, Hubungan antara Kecenderungan Gaya Hidup Hedonis dengan Perilaku Konsumtif pada Komunitas Hijabi Madura (Komunitas Hijabers Pamekasan), Program Studi Psikologi Universitas Trunojoyo Madura, 2014, Pembimbing : Zainal Abidin, S.Psi., M.Si., Hera Wahyuni, S.Psi., M.Psi, Psi.
xx + 70 Halaman, 17 Lampiran


Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui hubungan antara ecenderungan gaya hidup hedonis dengan perilaku konsumtif pada komunitas Hijabi Madura. Jenis penelitian ini adalah penelitian kuantitatif. Metode pengumpulan data yang digunakan adalah skala kecenderungan gaya hidup hedonis. Teknik pengambilan sampel dalam penelitian ini menggunakan teknik purposive sampling.  Jumlah sampel penelitian 44 orang dari jumlah populasi 157 orang. Terdapat  satu variabel bebas yaitu kecenderungan gaya hidup hedonis (X) serta satu variabel terikat yaitu perilaku konsumtif  (Y). Analisis data yang digunakan adalah menggunakan korelasi product moment dengan program spss 17.00 for windows. Hasil analisis data memperoleh nilai koefisien korelasi sebesar 0.184 dengan nilai sig sebesar 0.255 dan besar pengaruh antar variabel penelitian (koefisien determinasi) sebesar 0.08 (8%). Hal ini menunjukkan bahwa tidak ada hubungan yang signifikan antara kecenderungan gaya hidup hedonis dengan perilaku konsumtif pada komunitas Hijabi Madura (Komunitas Hijabers Pamekasan)


Kata Kunci  : Kecenderungan Gaya Hidup Hedonis, Perilaku Konsumtif, Komunitas Hijabi Madura
abstrak en:
SITI MAGHFIRAH, 100541100068, the Relationship between the Tendency of Hedonism Life Style with Consumtive Behavior from Hijabi Madura Community (Hijabers Community in Pamekasan),  Psychology Study Program, University of Trunjoyo Madura, 2014, Advisors: Zainal Abidin, S.Psi., M.Si., Hera Wahyuni, S.Psi., M.Psi, Psi.
xx + 70 Page, 17 Appendix

This research aim to determine the relationship between the tendency of hedonism life style and the consumtive behavior in the Hijabi Madura community (Hijabers community in Pamekasan). This research is a quantitative research, the technique of collecting data used tendency of hedonism life style scale.  The sample in this research is Hijabi Madura community, they are Hijabers community in the Pamekasan regency. The sample in this research is done by using purposive sampling technique. There are 44 person with a population of 157 person.  There is one  independent variable, it is tendency of hedonism life style (X) and one dependent variable, it is consumtive behavior (Y). The data is analyzed by using product moment correlation analysis method with SPSS 17.0 program for windows. The result of the data analysis on corelation gets the value 0,184 with  significant value  0,255, and gets the value of determination coefficient 0,008 (8%. It show that there is not a significant relationship between the tendency of hedonism life style with consumtive behavior from Hijabi Madura community (Hijabers community in Pamekasan).



Keyword: Hedonism Life style, Consumtive Behavior, Hijabi Madura Community

judul:
PERBEDAAN PENCAPAIAN PENILAIAN KINERJA KARYAWAN MANTRI PT. BANK RAKYAT INDONESIA (PERSERO),Tbk CABANG BANGKALAN
(ANTARA KARYAWAN TETAP DAN KARYAWAN KONTRAK)
abstrak id:
Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui perbedaan pencapaian penilaian kinerja karyawan mantri tetap dan karyawan mantri kontrak PT. Bank Rakyat Indonesia,Tbk. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kuantitatif inferensial. Penelitian ini menggunakan 28 sampel, yang terdiri dari 15 karyawan tetap dan 13 karyawan kontrak. Alat pengumpulan data menggunakan Skala Pencapaian Penilaian Kinerja yang terdiri dari 48 item pernyataan yang dikembangkan dari 6 aspek penilaian kinerja dari Robbin. Penelitian ini menggunkan uji beda Independent Samples Test dengan menggunakan program SPSS 16.0 for windows. Dari hasil analisi data diperoleh nilai t hitung < t tabel (-1.848 < 2,056) dan nilai signifikansi > daripada taraf signifikansi (?) 0,05 (0,076 > 0,05). Hasil ini menunjukkan bahwa tidak ada perbedaan pencapaian kinerja antara karyawan mantri tetap dan karyawan mantri kontrak. Hasil uji beda Independent Samples Test juga menunjukkan hasil rata-rata (mean) untuk karyawan tetap adalah 182,33 lebih kecil dibandindingkan rata-rata (mean) karyawan kontrak adalah 197,85, yang berarti bahwa pencapaian penilaian kinerja karyawan kontrak lebih tinggi dibandingkan karyawan tetap.

Kata Kunci: Penilain Kinerja, Karyawan, Tetap, Kontrak, Bank BRI, Bangkalan.
abstrak en:
This study aims to know the difference on assessing achievement of employees performance between settled staff and contractual staff of PT. Bank Rakyat Indonesia, Tbk. This research used a inferential quantitative. The method of this study used 28 sampel, which consists of 15 settled staffs dan 13 contract employees. Data collection used assessing achievement performance scale consisting of 48 item statements of 6 aspects of performance assessment developed by Robbin . This study used Independent assesement Samples  test  by using 16.0 SPSS program for windows. From the analysis it can be seen the results of t valuethan the
significance level (?) of 0.05 (0.076> 0.05). These results shows that there isn't specific difference on assessing achievement performance between the settled staffs and the contarctual mantri staffs. The result of Independent Samples Test also shows the average results (mean) of settled staffs is 182.33 smaller than the
average (mean) of the contract staffs which is 197.85, which means that assessing achievement performance of contract staffs is higher than contractual staffs.

Keywords: Assessing Performance, staffs, settled, Contract, Bank BRI, Bangkalan.

judul: Hubungan antara Self Regulated Learning dengan Kecemasan Akademik pada Siswa SMK IPIEMS Surabaya
abstrak id:
ABSTRAK
Kecemasan akademis adalah perasaan takut terhadap bahaya yang dianggap sebagai ancaman masa depan akademis siswa, sehingga mengakibatkan terganggunya pola pemikiran dan respon fisik serta perilaku sebagai tekanan dalam pelaksanaan tugas dan aktivitas yang beragam dalam situasi akademis. Self regulated learning adalah kemampuan belajar untuk memonitor, meregulasi, dan mengontrol aspek kognisi, motivasi, dan perilaku yang digunakan individu untuk berusaha mengarahkan dirinya dalam mencapai tujuan yang telah ditetapkan. Kecemasan akademis dan Self regulated learning merupakan faktor yang mempengaruhi performa akademis siswa. Penelitian yang bertujuan untuk mengetahui hubungan antara self regulated learning dengan kecemasan akademis pada siswa SMK IPIEMS Surabaya menggunakan metode kuantitatif korelasional. Variabel yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah self regulated learning dan kecemasan akademis. Alat pengumpul data berupa Skala Self Regulated Learning yang dikembangkan dari 3 aspek self regulated learning dari Zimmerman dan Skala Kecemasan Akademis yang dikembangkan dari 4 karakteristik kecemasan akademis yang diungkapkan Wolters. Populasi yang berjumlah 179 orang merupakan siswa SMK IPIEMS Surabaya dengan mengambil 65 sampel dari kelas XII SMK IPIEMS. Teknik pengambilan sampel yang digunakan adalah simple random sampling dengan analisis data yang digunakan analisis korelasi Product Moment dari Pearson menggunakan bantuan program SPSS 16.0  for window. Dari hasil analisis data penelitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat hubungan antara self regulated learning dengan kecemasan akademis pada siswa SMK IPIEMS Surabaya, diperoleh koefisien korelasi product moment person sebesar -0,671 dan tingkat signifikansi 0,000 (p<0,05) yang artinya peningkatan self regulated learning akan diikuti dengan penurunan kecemasan akademis.
Kata Kunci : self regulated learning, kecemasan akademis, siswa, Surabaya, SMK
abstrak en:
ABSTRACT
 Academic anxiety is the fear of the dangers that are considered as a threat of future academic students, resulting patterns of thought  and physical responses and behaviors as the pressure in the execution of tasks and activities in a variety of academic situations. Self-regulated learning is the ability to learn to monitor, regulate, and control aspects of cognition, motivation, and behaviors that individuals use to attempt to direct her in achieving the stated goals. Academic Anxiety and Self-regulated learning is a factor that affects the academic performance of students. The purpose of this research was to find relationship between self-regulated learning with academic anxiety in students of SMK Surabaya IPIEMS using quantitative correlation method. The variables used in this study are self-regulated learning and academic anxiety. Data collection tool in the form of Self Regulated Learning Scale developed from the 3 aspects of self-regulated learning Zimmerman and Academic Anxiety Scale developed from the 4 characteristics of academic anxiety Wolters disclosed. Population of 179 people is IPIEMS Surabaya vocational students by taking 65 samples of class XII SMK IPIEMS. The sampling technique used was simple random sampling with data analysis used analysis of Pearson Product Moment Correlation using SPSS 16.0 for windows. From the analysis of the data showed that there is a relationship between self-regulated learning with academic anxiety in students of SMK IPIEMS Surabaya, the product moment correlation coefficient was -0.671 person and a significance level of 0.000 (p <0.05), which means an increase in self-regulated learning will be followed with a decrease in academic anxiety.
Keyword: self regulated learning, academic anxiety, student, Surabaya, SMK
pembimbing_pertama: Hera Wahyuni, S. Psi, M. Psi, Psi
pembimbing_kedua: Nur Aziz Afandi, S. Psi, M. Si

judul: Hubungan Antara Intensitas Penggunaan Media Sosial Facebook Dengan Intimacy Remaja Dengan Orang Tua Tunggal (Single Parent)
abstrak id:
ABSTRAK
Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui adanya hubungan intensitas penggunaan media sosial facebook dengan intimacy remaja dengan orang tua tunggal. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kuantitatif korealasi pearson product moment dengan mengambil 30 sampel remaja usia 17 hingga 22 tahun dengan dengan kondisi keluarga tidak lengkap atau tunggal (single parent). Penggambilan sampel ini menggunakan teknik snowball sampling. Alat pengumpul data yang digunakan adalah Skala intimacy yang terdiri dari 48 butir pernyataan yang dikembangkan dari 3 aspek intimacy menurut Berscheid dan Reis dalam Sears, (2009). Dan Skala intensitas penggunaan media sosial facebook berjumlah 2 butir pernyataan favorable yang adopsi dari skala intensitas penggunaan facebook dari Choirunnisa (2010). Skala intemsitas ini dikembangkan dari 2 dimensi teori intensitas yang diungkapkan Effendi, (2005). Analisis data yang digunakan adalah analsis korelasi pearson product moment dengan program SPSS 17.0  for window. Dari hasil analisis data diperoleh nilai koefisien korelasi sebesar -0.578 dan koefisien dengan nilai p/sig. sebesar 0.003. dan Sig (2-tailed) sebesar 0.003 < 0.05. Hal ini menunjukan korelasi negatif yang kuat antara kedua variabel dan nilai sig (2-tailed) yang lebih kecil dibanding nilai ? yang berarti adanya hubungan signifikan antara variabel antara intensitas penggunaan media sosial facebook dengan variabel intimacy remaja dengan orangtua tunggal. 
Kata Kunci : intensitas facebook, intimacy, remaja, orang tua tunggal (single parent)
abstrak en:
ABSTRACT
This research has aimed to know the correlation of media social facebook usage with teen intimacy of young adult Towards Single Parent. This research uses quantitative correlated methods by taking 30 sample of teenagers aged 17 to 22 years with the condition is incomplete or single parent. This sampling using snowball sampling technique. Data collection instrument uses 48 item of intimacy scale with are developed from three aspects of intimacy from Berscheid and Reis in Sears, (2009). And the scale intensity of the social media  facebook use than 2 point favorable statement that the adaptation of the intensity scale use of facebook by Choirunnisa (2010). The intensity scale was developed from the 2-dimensional theory of intensity from Effendi, (1998). Analysis of the data used is the Pearson product moment correlation towards  SPSS program 17.0 for window. From the analysis of the data gained correlation coefficient of -0.578 and coefficients with p / sig. of 0.003.and  the significant (2-tailed) is 0.003 < 0.05 It means the result is shows strong negative correlation between 2 variable and significant grade is smaller than the ? grade, it means there is a significant correlation between the intensity of the use of social media facebook with teens intimacy with a single parent.
Keywords: facebook intensity, intimacy, teens, single parent

judul: Perilaku Seksual Wanita Madura yang Menopause
abstrak id:
Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui perubahan, bentuk, faktor yang mempengaruhi, permasalahan yang sering dialami, dan upaya penyesuaian diri terkait perilaku seksual wanita Madura yang menopause. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif dalam bentuk studi kasus. Pengambilan sampelnya secara snowball sampling. Subjek yang diteliti dalam penelitian ini adalah wanita Madura khususnya, ibu rumah tangga seperti ibu HO, RU, NI, dan ID yang telah menopause. Hasilnya, perubahan perilaku seksual subjek yaitu intensitas hubungan seksual meningkat, rangsangan lebih lama dan diwajibkan, kekhawatiran tidak dapat melayani suami dan suami tertarik pada wanita lain, serta mengubah/menjaga tampilan fisik agar lebih menarik dilihat suami, terhindar dari penyakit dan ketidakbebasan seks, dan meningkatkan kepercayaan dirinya. Bentuk perilaku seksual subjek, yaitu rangsangan lebih lama dan diwajibkan, mengeksplorasi teknik baru, dan membatasi bentuk hubungan seksual karena larangan agama seperti anal seks. Faktor yang mempengaruhi perilaku seksual subjek, yaitu makanan dan minuman khusus stamina; rangsangan; dihadapkan pada hal yang menghalangi seks; dipengaruhi lingkungan, media sosial, dan budaya Madura; kepuasan dan pengalaman seks masing-masing; pandangan masyarakat yang menerima dan menolak; dan masalah alat kelamin yaitu vagina kering dan bahkan tidak ada masalah. Permasalahan yang dialami subjek dalam hal seksnya adalah keterbatasana fisik; mudah terangsang; dorongan seks meningkat tetapi terhalang dari larangan suami, kondisi tubuh sendiri dan suami, dan fokus pikiran; tuntutan suami; dan berkurangnya gairah seks bila sedang sakit. Dengan demikian, upaya penyesuaian diri dilakukan sesuai dengan permasalahan subjek tetapi ada yang sudah efektif dan ada yang belum efektif.  

Kata kunci: Perilaku Seksual, Wanita Madura, dan Menopause
abstrak en:
The purpose of the study is to determine the change, shape, factors that mostly influence, problems often experienced and the effort of adaptation related to sexual behavior of madurase menopause women. The study uses qualitative method in a form of case study. Sample collecting technique applied is snowball sampling. Subject studied is Madurase women espescially house wives such as Mrs HO, RU, NI and ID that has been menopause. The results of study show that there is a change on subjects’ sexual behavior. The changes are: the increasing on sexual intercourse intensity, sexual stimulation in longer period and it is a necessity, the worry of not serving their husband well, having afraid of the husband will attract to another woman, changing appearance to attract spouse’s attention, disease avoiding and sex liability and improving self esteem. The forms of subject sexual behavior are: sexual stimulation in longer period and it is a necessity, exploring new sexual technique and limiting any forbidden sexual technique for religion restriction such as anal sex. Factors that influence the subjects’ sexual behavior are: particular food and beverages on stamina, stimulation, face on sexual blockage, environment influence, social media, Madurese’s culture, satisfaction and sexual experience on each subject, social assumption on accepting and rejecting and sexual problem; functional or dysfunctional vagina. Sexual problems experienced by subject is the limitation of physical, easily to get stimulated, sexual desire is increasing but it is not allowed by the spouse, the physical condition of husband and wife, overloading mind, spouse’s demand and the decreasing of sexual desire when having sick. Therefore, the problem solving is focused on adaptation whether the person conducts it effectively or not.

Keywords: Sexual Behavior, Madurase Women, and Menopause.

judul: GAMBARAN ADVERSITY QUOTIENT (AQ) PADA REMAJA  DI PANTI ASUHAN YANG MENERAPKAN BIMBINGAN SOSIAL
abstrak id:
Abstrak
Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui secara mendalam bagaimana Adversity Quotient (AQ) pada remaja Panti Asuhan Al-Amin Desa Munggugebang, Kecamatan Benjeng, Kabupaten Gresik melalui Bimbingan Sosial dan mengetahui faktor-faktor apa saja yang dapat mendukung Adversity Quotient (AQ) pada remaja yang tinggal Panti Asuhan Al-Amin. Subjek yang dilibatkan dalam penelitian ini adalah remaja berusia 13-15 tahun yang tinggal di panti asuhan Al-Amin dan telah mendapatkan bimbingan sosial. Peneliti menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif. Pengumpulan data dalm penelitian ini dilakukan dengan cara wawancara mendalam, obervasi subjek, dan studi dokumentasi yang berupa catatan harian subjek. Data tersebut kemudian dianalisis dengan cara mereduksi, menampilkan data display, dan memverifikasi hasil pengamatan sesuai dengn cara analisa data Miles and Huberman. Adversity Quotient (AQ) para subjek rata-rata berada pada tipe camper yang berhenti bertahan untuk mendapatkan keamanan. Adversity Quotient (AQ) subjek dapat diketahui dari beberapa aspek yang ada dalam teori Adversity Quotient (AQ) yakni Control, Origin and Ownership, Reach, and Endurance. Faktor-faktor yang dapat mendukung kemampuan Adversity Quotient (AQ) ke tiga subjek yang berusia remaja tersebut adalah motivasi dan perbaikan diri subjek berdasarkan kegiatan Bimbingan Sosial di panti asuhan yang telah diikuti oleh subjek dan keuletan, stress, tekanan, kemunduran tentang kondisi masa lalu subjek. Ke tiga subjek menganggap dengan adanya bimbingan sosial subjek dapat mengembangkan kemampuannya untuk menghadapi masalah yang ada dalam kehidupannya untuk lebih baik, termasuk juga bagaimana bersikap yang baik kepada orang lain baik itu orangtua, pengasuh dan teman-teman di asrama panti asuhan. Subjek hanya bisa menganggap  bahwa masa lalu adalah bagian dari kehidupan yang dapat digunakan sebagai motivasi hidup untuk menjadi lebih baik. 
Kata Kunci: Adversity Quotient (AQ), Bimbingan Sosial, Remaja Panti Asuhan
abstrak en:
Abstract
	The purpose of the study is to deeply determine Adversity Quotient (AQ) and Adversity Quotient (AQ) supporting factors on adolescents in Al-Amin Orphanage, Munggugebang village, Benjeng district, Gresik through social guidance. Subjects involved in the study are 13-15 years old adolescents who live in Al-Amin Orphanage and have obtained a social guidance. The researcher uses qualitative descriptive method. Data collecting method used is conducted through in-deep interview, subject observation and documentation study that consists of subject daily records. Then, the data is analyzed by reducing, displaying data and verifying the observation results based on Miles and Huberman data analysis method. Adversity Quotient (AQ) of each subjects are on camper type in average that stop holding on for security reason. Adversity Quotient (AQ) is possibly determined on some aspects in the theory of Adversity Quotient (AQ), they are Control, Origin and Ownership, Reach, and Endurance. Factors that support the three Adversity Quotients (AQ) in adolescent age are motivation and subject self improvement based on Social Guidance followed by the subject in orphanage, fortitude, stress, pressure, flash back on subject past experience. The three subjects assume that the presence of social guidance will develop their ability to deal with routine problems in better way, including how to behave toward old people, caregivers and friends in orphanage boarding house. Subjects will only assume that the past is only part of live which can be used to motivate someone to have a better life.
Keywords: Adversity Quotient (AQ), Social Guidance, Orphanage adolescents.

judul: Pengaruh Dawamul Wudhu terhadap Tingkat Kecemasan Siswa Sekolah Menengah Atas Tahfidz dalam menghafal Al Qur’an di Markaz Dirosah Qur’aniyah Pondok Pesantren Darul Ulum Banyuanyar
abstrak id:
Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh Dawamul Wudhu terhadap Tingkat Kecemasan siswa yang disebabkan oleh kompleksitas permasalahan di lingkungan pondok dan sekolah dalam menghafalkan Al Qur’an. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kuantitatif korelasional yang dilakukan pada 53 siswa yang diperoleh melalui teknik Random Sampling menurut Taro atau Slovin. Alat pengumpul data yang digunakan adalah Skala Dawamul Wudhu yang terdiri diri dari 46 butir pernyataan yang dikembangkan dari 4 aspek Dawamul Wudhu menurut Arkom dan Skala Kecemasan yang terdiridari 48 butir pernyataan yang dikembangkan dari 5 aspek kecemasan menurut Stuart dan Sundeen. Analisis data yang digunakan adalah analisis regresi sederhana dengan bantuan program SPSS 21.0 for windows. Dari hasil analisis data diperoleh nilai koefisien korelasi sebesar -0.225 dan koefisien regresi (B) sebesar 1.000 dengan nilai p/sig. sebesar 0.043. Hal ini menunjukkan bahwa ada pengaruh yang negatif dan signifikan antara Dawamul Wudhu dan Tingkat Kecemasan. Peningkatan perilaku Dawamul Wudhu diikuti dengan penurunan Tingkat Kecemasan pada siswa SMA Tahfidz yang menghafal Al Qur’an di Markaz Dirosah Qur’aniyah Pondok Pesantren Banyuanyar.

Kata Kunci:	Dawamul Wudhu, Tingkat Kecemasan, Al Qur’an, Markaz Dirosah Qur’aniyah, Pondok Pesantren.
abstrak en:
The purpose of this research was to know the influence of Eternal Ritual Ablution toward Level of Anxiety on Students it caused by the complexity of the problems in the school and the cottage environment. this research uses a quantitative correlation method was conducted to 53 students obtained by using Simple randome sampling technique according to Taro or Slovin. The instrument of collecting data was Eternal Ritual Ablution Scale consists 46 items that developed from 4 aspects of Eternal Ritual Ablution according to Arkom. and Anxiety Scale consists 48 items that developed from 5 aspects according to Satuart and Sundeen. The Analysis of the data that used is simple regression analysis with SPSS 21.0 for windows. from the result of this analysis it was obtained the value of correlation coefficient of-0225 and the value of regression coefficient of 1.000 with the value of p/sig. of 0.043. It show that there is a negative and significant influence between Eternal Ritual Ablution and level of anxiety, the Increase of Eternal Ritual Ablution followed by a decrease in the Level of Anxiety on Students of Tahfidz Senior High School who memorize the Qur'an in Qur’anic Education Center of Banyuanyar Islamic Boarding School.

Keywords:	Eternal Ritual Ablution, Level of Anxiety, the Qur'an, Qur’anic Education Center, Islamic Boarding School.

judul: Pembentukan Karakter Melalui Budaya Abhâsa di Lingkungan Pondok Pesantren Baiturrahman Desa Panaguan Kecamatan Larangan Kabupaten Pamekasan Madura
abstrak id:
Tujuan dari penelitian ini untuk menjelaskan proses pembentukan karakter melalui budaya abhâsa, mengetahui perilaku yang muncul setelah subjek memahami budaya abhâsa, dan mengetahui faktor apa saja yang mendukung ataupun yang menghambat subjek untuk dapat menggunakan bahasa abhâsa. Penelitian ini dilakukan di Pondok Pesantren Baiturrahman dengan menggunakan metode penelitian kualitatif. Metode pengambilan data menggunakan wawancara dan observasi, serta menggunakan catatan lapangan dan perekaman wawancara sebagai alat pengumpulan data. Data yang diperoleh dianalisis dengan menggunakan teknik analisis data kualitatif, yaitu: Analisis domain, taksonomi, komponensial, dan tema kultural. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa pembentukan karakter melalui budaya abhâsa memberikan pengetahuan terhadap subjek penelitian tentang sikap hormat dan tanggung jawab dalam bersikap yang memunculkan perilaku ta’dhim, tidak cangkolang, saling menghargai, sopan, rendah hati, dan kontrol diri. Faktor-faktor yang mendukung terhadap pembentukan karakter melalui budaya abhâsa adalah:1) Agama, 2) Lingkungan (pesantren, people’s power, pendekatan: pembiasaan, keteladanan, hukuman, pembinaan disiplin), 3) Peranan sosial (status, position, expectation), dan 4) Tujuan hidup bermasyarakat. Ditemukan juga faktor lain yang kurang mendukung, yaitu kurangnya partisipasi dari orang tua dalam mengajarkan anak mereka tentang abhâsa.

Kata kunci: pembentukan karakter, budaya abhâsa, Pondok Pesantren, Baiturrahman.
abstrak en:
The purpose of this study to explain the process of character building through culture of abhâsa, know the behavior of that appears after the subject understanding culture of abhâsa, and knowing what factors support or hinder the subject to use the abhâsa language. This research is done in Baiturrahman boarding school by qualitative method. With interview and observation, and also use the note of daily activities and tape recording of interview as the data collection. The data is analysis by qualitative method, that is analysis of domain, taxonomy, componential, and cultural theme. The result of this research showed that building character with abhâsa gave a knowledge toward a subject of research about etiquette and responsibilities in behaviouristic that appear of ta’dhim, and not cangkolang, good attitude, obsequious, and self control. The supports of factor through abhâsa is: 1) Religion, 2.) Environment (boarding school, people’s power, approachment: habitually, exemplary, chastisement, and discipline), 3) Social participation (status, position, expectation), and 4) The purpose of life in society. And it’s found of another factor that not support, that is no participating from parents in teaching their children about abhâsa.

Key words: Character building, abhâsa culture, boarding school, Baiturrahman.

judul: A Study of Language Variety on Facebook Status
abstrak id:
ABSTRACT

Aisyah. 08.05.111.00018. A Study of Language variety on Facebook Status.Thesis.English Department of the Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences, Trunojoyo Madura University. Advisors: (I) Iqbal Nurul Azhar, S.S., M.Hum. (II) DiahIkawatiA , SS., M.Pd


The objective of this study is to explain kinds of language variety and what varieties do mostly occuron the Facebook status. Furthermore, the writer took in total 76data, after the obtained data had been collected, she identified and classified and discussed the varieties occur and finds what language variety is dominantly used. 
Based on statement of research problems are as follows: (1) what kinds of language varieties can be found on the Facebook Status, (2) What kinds of language varieties do mostly occur on Facebook status. This study applies an identity method on explaining language varieties used on the Facebook status. The writer compares the varieties with the normal usage of language.This study is classified as a descriptive qualitative study.
The findings and discussion found kinds of varieties which exist in data are dialect, written style variety, informal variety, basilect. Then, Language variety which mostly occurs is written style variety.




Keywords: Language Variety, the user of language, the usage of language and Facebook Status

judul: A study of Conjunction Translation in the novel "The Old Man and The Sea" and Its Translation
abstrak id:
ABSTRACT

Husnia, Atik. 08.05.111.00017. A Study of  Conjunction Translation  in the Novel The Old Man and The Sea and Its Translation. Thesis. English Study Program of the Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences, Trunojoyo Madura University. Advisors: (I) Sriyono, S.S., M.Hum. (II) Rosyida Ekawati, SS., MA.

This study concerns about translation, especially kinds and procedure in translating conjunction in the novel The Old Man and The Sea. This study aimed to identify the translation variation of English conjunctions in the novel The Old Man and the Sea and its translation and explain the procedure that is applied by translator in transferring English conjunction from source text into target text. 
Moreover, this study analyzes the conjunction translation  uses Halliday and Hassan’s theory that is found in the novel The Old Man and The Sea. The seven procedures of translation which are proposed by Vinay and Darberlnet in Venuti is also involved in analyzing the data. Qualitative design is applied in this study because the data were collected and analyzed in the form of words. The data of this study is the conjunctions found in the novel.
The findings found four types in translating conjunction. They are literal translation of English conjunction, translation variation of English conjunction into Indonesian conjunction, translation of English conjunction into Indonesian non-conjunction, and zero-translation of English conjunction. Furthermore, literal translation, modulation, and transposition procedure are the most applied in translating conjunction from source text into target text.


Keywords: translation, conjunction, procedure of translation

judul: The Universal Narrative Structure in John Steinbeck's Tortilla Flat
abstrak en:
ABSTRACT

Hanif, Mochammad. 08.05.111.00027. The Universal Narrative Structure in John Steinbecks Tortilla Flat. Thesis. English Study Program of the Faculty of Social and Cultural Science, University of Trunojoyo Madura. Advisors: (I) Imron Wakhid Harits, S.S,M.Pd. (II) Rifah Inayati, S.S. M. A

	John Steinbecks Tortilla Flat tells about the life of Paisano. There are six characters that live in the house. They are Danny, Pilon, Pablo, Jesus Maria, Pirate, and Big Joe. They face the economical problem and live in Dannys house. Living in one house really gives the effect for the relation of those characters in reaching their ambitions. 
	This study is qualitative research. In addition, the theory used to analyze the novel is Greimas Structuralism. This theory is used to find the universal narrative structure in the novel. It is divided into two parts, those are actantial structure and functional structure. Functional structure is subdivided into two parts, those Greimas functions and functional model.
	Based on the analysis, it can be concluded that there are eight schemes of actantial structure that can be identified in the novel. However, there are only three schemes of actantial structure which have the receiver. Therefore, there are only three struggles that reach the last situation in functional model. Among twenty functions of functional structure, there are twelve functions that can be identified in the novel.

Key Words: Greimas, Actantial structure, functional structure, Greimas functions, functional model.

judul: A Study of Conversational Implicature Uttered By The Main Characters In Dinner For Schmucks Film
abstrak id:
ABSTRACT

Andrianto, Deny. 08.05.111.00057. A Study of Conversational Implicature Uttered by The Main Characters in Dinner for Schmucks Film. Thesis. English Study Program of the Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences, University of Trunojoyo Madura. Advisors: (I) Sriyono, S.S., M.Hum. (II) Iqbal Nurul Azhar, S.S., M.Hum.


This study focuses on conversational implicature uttered by the main characters in Dinner for Schmucks film. This study aims to identify the kind of conversational implicature mostly uttered by the main characters in Dinner for Schmucks film and the mechanisms used by the main characters to utter conversational implicature in Dinner for Schmucks film. In addition, to analyze the data, this study uses Grice’s theory who divides conversational implicature into generalized and particularized conversational implicature. This study also uses the theory of Grice related to the mechanisms of creating conversational implicature. Moreover, this study is conducted using a qualitative design because the data are in the form of words. The data of this study are the utterances of the main characters (Tim and Barry) when they have conversation. The data of this study are collected by using content analysis method. 
The data analysis reveals the findings covering the formulated research questions. Firstly, the kind of conversational implicature mostly uttered by the main characters in Dinner for Schmucks film is particularized conversational implicature. It is demonstrated by 20 data or 68,9% of the data categorized as particularized conversational implicature. The second position goes to generalized conversational implicature. It is shown by 7 data or 24,2% of the data classified into generalized conversational implicature. In addition, in Dinner for Schmucks, it is found that one conversation contains both generalized and particularized conversational implicature. It is proved by 2 data or 6,9% of the data which contains both generalized and particularized conversational implicature. Moreover, the main characters use the mechanisms of standard implicature and a deliberately flouting four maxims of cooperative principle to utter conversational implicature.




Keywords: Conversational Implicature, The Mechanisms, Dinner for  Schmucks Film
abstrak en:
ABSTRACT

judul: Lady Macbeth's Somnambulism in Shakespeare's Macbeth
abstrak en:
ABSTRACT

Maryono, Tri. 06.05.1.1.1.00005. Lady Macbeths Somnambulism in Shakespeares Macbeth. Thesis. English Study Program of the Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences, University of Trunojoyo Madura. Advisors: (I) Dr. Suryo Tri Saksono (II) Suci Suryani, S.S., M.Pd.


This Study is about Lady Macbeths somnambulism. This study focuses on how she performs somnambulism, the causes that make she becomes somnambulist and the effects to the play itself. In addition, this study focuses on Lady Macbeth becoming somnambulist.
The theory of psychoanalysis is used in analyzing the Lady Macbeths somnambulism. Psychoanalysis and literature is used to be the underlying theory that focuses on the use of psychological values in literature. Unconscious used to be underlying theory that focuses on human experience that stored as their memories. Somnambulism used to described and analyze the somnambulism that infects her mind. In addition, this study uses qualitative design. The data for this study are limited to the words that connected and explained her somnambulism. In collecting the data, this study uses documentation method. The technique in getting the data are reading and observing the play, finding the data by random sampling, putting sign, and identify the words, taking the data, grouping and presenting in data display.
After analyzing the play, it concludes that Lady Macbeth is a somnambulist marked by awake in the night and doing daily activities but all her sense are shuts. It means that all her performances are unconscious. Lady Macbeths somnambulism is caused by her several complexes repressed experiences, her emotional conflicts, the influence of the three witches, and the ghosts appearance. Her somnambulism in the play contributes complexities to the play. Shakespeare conducts the scene of somnambulism or sleepwalking to the figure of Lady Macbeth as the final consequences she must finally get. It shows the humanity values of the play, evil deeds finally repaid. The somnambulism of Lady Macbeth also shows the degradation of Lady Macbeth from the very beginning to the last in which she finally suicides. The degradation of Lady Macbeth shows the changing of evil-like woman to the most suffered woman showing the real nature of her.


Key Word: Somnambulism, Lady Macbeth, Unconscious.

judul: Alice's Personalities in Her Late Childhood in Lewis Carroll's Alice's Adventures in Wonderland & Through the Looking- Glass
abstrak id:
ABSTRACT
Dini, Sekar, Aroma. 08.05.1.1.1.00008. Alice’s Personalities in Her Late Childhood in Lewis Carroll’s Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland & Through the Looking Glass Thesis. English Study Program of Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences, University of Trunojoyo Madura. Advisors: (I) Dr. Suryo Tri Saksono, M.Pd. (II) Erika Citra Sari H, S.S., M.Pd. 
	This study uses two titles of Alice’s adventures story. They are Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland & Through the Looking- Glass. Alice is the main character of this novel. She travels a lot and so interesting to be analyzed. Since Alice is a young girl, both titles formed the personalities of a seven years old child. For a child in seven years old, it is also called as ‘the late childhood’. Therefore, this study focuses on the personalities of Alice through her dream which concerns the narrations from narrator and utterances of Alice and some characters in the novel. Hence, psychoanalysis by Sigmund Freud is used as tool to analyze this novel. 
	Because this study is qualitative, the writer is the key instrument and the data are described in the form of words. Consequently, the utterances of some characters that related to the main character’s personality are used to reveal the elaboration of Alice’s personality through her dream. Hence the data collection was done simultaneously with the data analysis.
	 After the study has been done, it uncovers Alice’s dream with her whish- fulfillment of her imagination fantasy to satisfy her great curiosity. This study also reveals Alice’s personalities in her late childhood through her dream start to form the groups of personality. They are structure of personality and dynamic of personality. From the structure of personality it is drawn that: (1) The  id is a Wonderland, (2) The ego is Alice, and (3) The superego is the advices and suggestions from other characters such as a Caterpillar, the Duchess, the Mock Turtle, and the White Knight. From the dynamic of personality, Alice’s anxiety is appeared when Alice afraid to be beheaded by the Queen of Heart. Therefore, Alice’s anxious motivates her to do something to avoid the dangerous.  

Keywords: Child, Dream, Personality

judul: The Language Variations Used by Transgender (A Study in Sofa's Salon at Blega District of Bangkalan)
abstrak id:
ABSTRACT
Arifin, Samsul 08.05.1.1.1.00054. The Language Variations Used by Transgender (A Study in Sofa’s Salon at Blega District of Bangkalan). Thesis. English Study Program of Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences, University of Trunojoyo Madura. Advisor (I) Iqbal Nurul Azhar, S.S., M.Hum and Advisor (II) Sriyono, S.S., M.Hum.

This study concerns the phenomenon of language variations used by transgender in Sofa’s salon at Blega district of Bangkalan. It is intended to (1) know what kinds of language variations are often used by transgender in Sofa’s salon at Blega district of Bangkalan (2) get an understanding about the reasons behind the existence of language variations. This study uses descriptive qualitative method. The data was collected from June 1 to June 22, 2012 by participating in informants’ conversation, and observing the informants’ utterances. The informants were six transgender who participated in all of the activities in Sofa’s salon. The informants were also interviewed to get the information why they used language variations. This study uses Labov’s theory of the types of language variations. 
Based on the data analysis, it is found that dealing with the speakers’ utterances, language variations occur among the informants. Statistically, the percentage of Slang variations is 79.27%, Vulgar is 18.01% and Acrolect is 2.7%. It was also found that the informants often used slang variations rather than others. In addition, the informants never used colloquial, jargon, bassilect, argot and cant variations. 
This study has revealed the reasons of language variations; they are (1) the informants can communicate with a certain group, they belong to, (2) making other people outside the community being curious, (3) being closer with the other transgender in the same community, and (4) it became their habit. Four reasons appeared in the informants conversation. The percentage of each reasons: the informants can communicate with a certain group, they belong to is 57,14%, making other people outside the community being curious is 14,28%, being closer with other transgender in the same community is 14,28%, it became their habit is 14,28%. 

Keywords: Language Variations, Transgender

judul: THE PORTRAIT OF ENGLAND'S SOCIAL CONDITION IN THE 18TH CENTURY IN JANE AUSTEN NORTHANGER ABBEY
abstrak id:
ABSTRACT

Amalia, Riska. 08.05.111.00001. Portrait of England’s Social Condition in the 18th Century in Jane Austen’s Northanger Abbey. Thesis. English Study Program of the Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences, Trunojoyo University Madura. Advisors: (I) Dr. Suryo Tri Saksono (II) Rif’ah Inayati, S.S, M.A

This study uses qualitative design, because this study analyses about literary work. Literary work that is used in this study is Northanger Abbey. It is a novel that is written by Jane Austen. This study is concerned with portrait of England’s social condition in the 18th century that is portrayed in Northanger Abbey. To strengthen about it, this study uses sociology of work.
Sociology of work is used in this study, because it is focussed on the literary work itself. It is used to prove that Northanger Abbey is a novel that portrays real life.
After analysing problem and data of this study, it can be concluded that Northanger Abbey portrays real life of England in the 18th century. England in the 18th century has existance of industrial revolution. It gives influence for several aspects of England at that time. It influences English society. It creates status hierarchy. It also influences England customs in the 18th century, such as; consumerism, fashion and reading. It also influences marriage in England in the 18th century.

Key words: Sociology of Work, Status Hierarchy, England’s Social Condition

judul: IMAGERY IN WILLIAM BLAKE'S "THE CHIMNEY SWEEPER"
abstrak id:
Sastra adalah tulisan imajinatif atau kreatif, terutama nilai seni yang diakui. Tidak ada bagian dari kehidupan yang belum pernah ditulis tentang, sehingga bisa mencerminkan pengalaman penulis. Melalui kreativitas penulis, karya sastra akan menjadi manis dan bermanfaat.
Ruang lingkup penelitian ini adalah Kritik Baru dalam arti luas dan penerapan teori dalam menganalisis puisi, terutama di puisi William Blake yang berjudul “The Chimney Sweeper.” Studi ini membahas tentang pencitraan yang terdapat di puisi “Chimney Sweeper." Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menjawab pertanyaan-pertanyaan berikut, (1) Jenis citra di "The Chimney Sweeper," dan (2) Pesan yang dapat dipelajari dari puisi itu.
Melalui penelitian kualitatif yang luas ditemukan bahwa berbagai jenis citra yang ditemukan di Blake "The Chimney Sweeper," tetapi jelas bahwa citra visual mendominasi keberadaan pencitraan dalam puisi ini. Blake menggunakan citra visual untuk memperkuat tema dalam sebuah puisi. Pesan yang paling penting yang dapat dipelajari dari puisi yang indah ini adalah cara bagaimana bersikap terhadap kondisi, baik buruk atau baik. Puisi ini mengajarkan orang bagaimana untuk bersyukur kepada Tuhan.

Kata Kunci: the chimney sweeper, Tuhan, citra.
abstrak en:
Literature is imaginative or creative writing, especially of recognized artistic value. There is no part of life that has never been written about, so it could reflect the author’s experience. Through the creativity of the author, literary works will be sweet and useful. 
The scope of this study is New Criticism in broad sense and the application of the theory in analyzing poetry, especially in William Blake’s “The Chimney Sweeper.” The discussion of the study is limited on the kinds of imagery which are found on words and phrases employed in William Blake’s “The Chimney Sweeper.” This study is aimed to answer the following questions, (1) Kinds of imagery in “The Chimney Sweeper,” and (2) Messages that can be learnt from the poem. 
Through extensive qualitative research it is found that many kinds of imagery are found in Blake’s “The Chimney Sweeper,” but it is clear that visual image dominates the existence of imagery in this poem. Blake uses visual image to strengthen a theme in a poem. The most important message that can be learnt from this beautiful poem is the way how to behave toward a condition, either bad or good. This poem teaches people how to thank to God appropriately.

Key Word: chimney sweeper, God, imagery.

judul: HOLLY KENNEDY'S GRIEF IN CECELIA AHERN'S P.S. I LOVE YOU
abstrak en:
ABSTRACT

Fatmawati, Alvita Eka. 08.05.1.1.1.00026. Holly Kennedys Grief in Cecelia Aherns P.S. I Love You. Thesis. English Study Program of the Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences. University of Trunojoyo Madura. Advisors: (I) Imron Wakhid Harits, S.S., M.Pd,  (II) Suci Suryani, S.S., M.Pd.

	This study is concerns with psychological problem which is about grief. This study intends to discuss the grief experienced by the main character in the novel. Concerning with these matter, this study focuses on the symptoms that shows the main characters grief and how the main character overcome her grief. Hence, Hollys life after Gerrys death, the symptoms of grief, and the way of Holly overcomes the grief is the main discussion of this study. 
	Psychology and Literature is used to be the underlying theory focuses on the grief topic to analyze the novel. Grief is used to analyze the symptoms which are appeared by the main character as the symptoms of grief. Grief itself has the great influence in analyzing this study because the concept of grief definitely describes the symptoms. In addition, this study uses qualitative research.
	After analyzing the novel, the conclusions of this study is Holly is able to overcome, which is the meaning is moving on, because of her obedience in following Gerrys request on the list. The list itself in the future leads Holly to be able to restart her life again and makes Holly ready to fall in love again without forgetting her past.


Key Words: Psychology and Literature, Grief Symptoms, Holly Kennedy

THE PORTRAIT OF AMERICAN UPPER CLASS SOCIETY IN F. SCOTT FITZGERALD'S THE GREAT GATSBY
abstrak id:
ABSTRACT 



Handoyo, Deka Yanuar. (08.05.1.1.1.00006). The Portrait of American Upper Class Society in F. Scott Fitzgerald’s The Great Gatsby. Thesis. English Study Program of the Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences, University of Trunojoyo Madura. Advisors: (I) Dr. Suryo Tri Saksono, (II) Erika Citra Sari Hartanto, S.S, M.Hum. 

Since the novel entitled The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald portrays the social condition of American upper class society in 1920s is unique and interesting to be discussed, this study is intended to describe the economic condition of America, and the influences of economic condition of America toward upper class’ life style. Concerning with these matters, this study focuses on the analysis of the characters’ utterances and author’s narration portraying American upper class society in 1920s. Sociology of literature, especially sociology of work is used as the basis theory to analyze the social condition of society in the certain time that is portrayed in the novel.
 This is a qualitative study because in line with the features of qualitative research that the data collection was done simultaneously with the data analysis. There are three related processes in the data analysis; reducing data, displaying data and making conclusion.
After analyzing the novel, the study finds out that F. Scott Fitzgerald as the author portrays American upper class society during 1920s in his novel. It greatly shows how the response and the condition of American upper class in some aspects of life. Those aspects are economy and life style.
America experienced the economic boom in 1920s. Many industries and business expansion appeared in America. Consequently, America became wealthy country, and it could give many impacts to the American society at the time. The impacts included prosperity until life style changing. They prefer to live in glamorous and wealthy such as attending luxurious party, driving sophisticated automobile, drinking alcohol, having love affair, etc. 

  
Keywords: Upper Class, Life Style, Jazz Age, Economic Boom, American

A STUDY OF IMPLICATURES IN MEAN GIRLS 2 FILM
abstrak id:
Mutamtam, A. 07.05.1.1.1.00001. A Study of Implicatures in Mean Girls 2 film. Thesis. English Department of the Faculty of Social and Cultural Sciences, University of Trunojoyo Madura. Advisors: (I) Rosyida Ekawati, SS., MA., (II) Diah Ikawati A , SS., M.Pd.

ABSTRACT

A communication can fail if there is no mutual understanding between the speaker and hearer because they use implicatures in their conversation. It can be found from Mean Girls 2 film, especially in dialogues between Jo and Abby. Based on the reason above, the question can be formulated as follows: (1) what kinds of implicatures occur in Mean Girls2? (2) What kinds of implicatures mostly occur in Mean Girls 2? (3) How are implicatures used by Jo and Abby in Means Girls 2? This study aims to (1) identify kinds of implicatures occur in Mean Girls 2, (2) identify kinds of implicatures mostly occur in Mean Girls 2, (3) explain implicatures used in Mean Girls 2.
This research was conducted using qualitative method. It was used to give comprehensive descriptions and discover the use of implicature in the film. The researcher was the key instrument of the research because she was who analyzed the data. The techniques of data collection were looking for the transcript of the film, watching the movie, reading the transcript of the movie, and selecting utterances produced by the main characters. The data analysis was done by arranging data collection, classifying the utterances into the types of implicature, discussing the findings, and concluding.
This study found several findings: (1) Implicature used by Jo and Abby could be categorized into conventional implicature and conversational implicature of cooperative principle, (2) Conversational implicature was used mostly by the speaker to express meaning behind the utterance, (3) Implicature was used when the speaker delivers utterance become context-free, so the hearer sometimes can guess the meaning behind the utterance but also cannot guess the meaning.

Key Word: Conventional implicature, Conversational implicature, Cooperative principle, Means Girls 2.

judul: WILLY'S BASIC NEEDS IN ARTHUR MILLER'S DEATH OF A SALESMAN
abstrak en:
ABSTRACT
Permatasari, Mery. 08.05.1.1.1.00020. Death of a Salesman Thesis. English Department English Department Social and Cultural Sciences Faculty, Trunojoyo University. Advisors: (I) Suci Suryani, S.S., M.Pd. (II) Imron Wakhid Harits, S.S., M.Pd.

This study concerns on psychology on literature mainly on basic needs theory by Maslow. Basic needs theory support human to fulfill their needs step by step based on hierarchy of needs. The steps of hierarchy of consist of physiological needs, safety needs, love needs, esteem needs, and self-actualization needs. These needs existed on Death of a Salesman drama by Athur Miller. Because of this reason, the drama is interesting to be analyzed under the title Willy’s Basic Needs in Arthur Miller’s Death of a Salesman. The aim of this study is helping the student of English Study Program to understand Maslow’s basic needs theory with the result that the student can apply the basic needs approach to analyze literary works.
This study includes in qualitative research method because it fulfills the characteristics and the features of qualitative research methodology such as, the data are the author’ narrations and the character’s utterances rather than the number form, and the researcher is the key instrument. The author’s narration and the character’s utterances describe that basic needs theory fulfills step by step.
After analyzing the drama, the conclusions of this study is basic needs support human in this case the main character, Willy, to fulfill Willy’s needs step by step based on hierarchy of needs. Willy’s hierarchy of needs such as Willy’s physiological needs, Willy’s safety needs, Willy’s love needs, Willy’s esteem needs, and Willy’s self-actualization needs. 

Keywords:  Psychology of Literature, Maslow, Hierarchy of Needs,

judul: Personality Development of Thomas Sawyer in Twain's "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer"
abstrak id:
The Adventures of Tom Sawyer adalah salah satu novel ternama yang ditulis oleh Mark Twain pada tahun 1873. Analisis ini menggunakan teori psikologi yang fokus pada teori perkembangan personaliti. Yang menarik dari analisis ini adalah pembaca dan penulis dapat mengetahui perkembangan psikologi pada anak – anak. Pembaca dapat mengetahui perkembangan personaliti Tom Sawyer dari berbagai kejadian yang telah di lewatinya. Studi ini mempelajari tentang bagaimana anak – anak mengalami perkembangan personaliti setelah banyak kejadian yang dialami dalam kehidupannya. Studi ini membahas tentang factor dan efek yang merubah Tom menjadi anak yang lebih baik.
Key Words : Personality Development, Tom’s Personality Development.
abstrak en:
This study discussed personality development which experienced by Thomas Sawyer. Personality development is the one of interesting topics to be discussed. It is learnt about how children grown their behavior and their personality after through many ways, especially from the adventures and their challenges which is experienced by them. Therefore, this study discussed about factors and effect which change Tom’s personality to become a better boy.
Key Words : Personality Development, Tom’s Personality Development.

judul: A study of Illocutionary Acts in "The Proposal" Film
abstrak id:
A STUDY OF ILLOCUTIONARY ACTS IN
“THE PROPOSAL” FILM
ABSTRACT
This study concerns with the phenomena of types and functions of illocutionary acts used by the main characters in “The Proposal” film. It is intended to (1) identify the types of illocutionary acts which are found in the utterance in “The Proposal” film”; (2) identify the functions of illocutionary act which are found in “The Proposal” film; (3) identify the most frequent function of illocutionary acts that appears in “The Proposal” film. This study uses qualitative method. The data was collected by watching and writing the utterance the main characters in “The Proposal” film. The data analyzed is done based on Searle theory of the types of illocutionary acts and function of illocutionary acts.
Based on the data analysis, it is found that all types of illocutionary acts occur in the utterances produced by Margaret and Andrew in “The Proposal” film. Seventeen or equal with 45, 9 % is directive. Eight or equal with 21, 6% is expressive. Five or equal with 13, 5% is representative. Four or equal with 10, 8%is commisive. Three or equal with 8, 1% is declarative. The result shows that the functions of illocutionary acts found in the Margaret’s and Andrew’s utterances are request, refusal, warning, recommendation, and complaint. As many as to utterances or equal with 37, 1 % is request, seven or equal with 20 % is refusal. There are have the same score, Five or equal with 14, 2% is warning and the other 14, 2% is thanking, four or equal with 11, 4% is complaint, one or equal with 2, 8 % is recommendation.
This study has revealed that the most functions often used are request. Most of the utterances produced by the main characters are request as well.
Keywords: illocutionary acts in “The Proposal” film.
abstrak en:
A STUDY OF ILLOCUTIONARY ACTS IN
“THE PROPOSAL” FILM
ABSTRACT
This study concerns with the phenomena of types and functions of illocutionary acts used by the main characters in “The Proposal” film. It is intended to (1) identify the types of illocutionary acts which are found in the utterance in “The Proposal” film”; (2) identify the functions of illocutionary act which are found in “The Proposal” film; (3) identify the most frequent function of illocutionary acts that appears in “The Proposal” film. This study uses qualitative method. The data was collected by watching and writing the utterance the main characters in “The Proposal” film. The data analyzed is done based on Searle theory of the types of illocutionary acts and function of illocutionary acts.
Based on the data analysis, it is found that all types of illocutionary acts occur in the utterances produced by Margaret and Andrew in “The Proposal” film. Seventeen or equal with 45, 9 % is directive. Eight or equal with 21, 6% is expressive. Five or equal with 13, 5% is representative. Four or equal with 10, 8%is commisive. Three or equal with 8, 1% is declarative. The result shows that the functions of illocutionary acts found in the Margaret’s and Andrew’s utterances are request, refusal, warning, recommendation, and complaint. As many as to utterances or equal with 37, 1 % is request, seven or equal with 20 % is refusal. There are have the same score, Five or equal with 14, 2% is warning and the other 14, 2% is thanking, four or equal with 11, 4% is complaint, one or equal with 2, 8 % is recommendation.
This study has revealed that the most functions often used are request. Most of the utterances produced by the main characters are request as well.
Keywords: illocutionary acts in “The Proposal” film.

judul: POLITENESS EXPRESSIONS IN ANIME HANASAKU IROHA
abstrak id:
This study focuses on politeness expressions found in Japanese Animation “Hansaku Iroha” by using Leech’s maxim of politeness, and Holmes’ social dimension. Politeness is forms of behaviour that establish and maintain comity.  Maxims of politeness is a number of maxims dealing with polite behavior.  The maxims that operate in politeness principle are tact maxim, generosity maxim, approbation maxim, modesty maxim, agreement maxim, and sympathy maxim. Japanese language has a system to express politeness, and Japanese animation includes this system. 
This study is conducted using qualitative method. The source of data in this study is the first five episode of anime entitled Hanasaku Iroha The data are the utterances of the main characters in the anime that contain the politeness expressions. 
The result of the study showed that the characters in the anime express politeness using suffix –san when addressing others, they also use respect language to speak politely, besides that, their politeness also follows Leech’s maxim of politeness. All of the six maxims can be found in the anime. The result also shows that their politeness have purposes. The first one is to maintain harmony between characters. The next is to show social distance. The third one is to distinct the status among characters, and the last one is to show formality. 

Keywords: Politeness, Maxim of Politeness, Respect Language, Social     Dimension, Anime.
abstrak en:

judul: HUMOR STRATEGIES USED BY INDONESIAN COMICS IN STAND UP COMEDY INDONESIA
abstrak id:
HUMOR STRATEGIES USED BY INDONESIAN COMICS
IN STAND UP COMEDY INDONESIA


Nabila Fidiyandini
Prodi Sastra Inggris
Universitas Trunojoyo Madura


Abstrak: Strategi humor merupakan bagian terpenting dalam rencana sebuah penampilan Stand Up Comedy yang telah dipersiapkan secara matang oleh tiap komika. Tertarik dengan fenomena berkembangnya Stand Up Comedy di Indonesia, artikel ini dibuat untuk menemukan strategi humor apa saja yang digunakan oleh para komika Indonesia dan bagaimana strategi tersebut digunakan. Teknik lelucon, majas, dan fitur linguistik dalam penceritaan lelucon menjadi 3 tiang besar dalam pembahasan artikel. Dalam artikel yang bersifat deksriptif kualitatif ini, penulis menggunakan metode observasi dalam upaya pengumpulan data yang didapat dari video penampilan Stand Up Comedy para objek artikel. Analisis artikel ini dibatasi pada penampilan 3 komika Indonesia yang menggunakan bahasa Inggris dalam setiap penampilannya. Mereka adalah Reggy Hasibuan, Dana Pandawa, dan Otnamree. Dengan dibuatnya artikel ini diharapkan dapat berkontribusi pada perkembangan penelitian tentang Stand Up Comedy Indonesia (khususnya di bidang Linguistik). 


Kata Kunci: Humor Strategies, Joke Techniques, Figurative Languages, Linguistic Features of Joke Telling, Stand Up Comedy Indonesia
abstrak en:
HUMOR STRATEGIES USED BY INDONESIAN COMICS
IN STAND UP COMEDY INDONESIA

Nabila Fidiyandini 
Undergraduate Student of English Study Program
University of Trunojoyo Madura

	Abstract
This study is concerned with humor strategies used by English-speaking Indonesian comics in Stand Up Comedy as well as remarks as the very first research about non-native English speaker who use English in their stand up performances. This study uses descriptive qualitative design. The source of data is the videos of stand up comedy performances, while the data is the utterances of Indonesian comics. The technique used in collecting data is observation method. The conclusion of this study are: (1) in stand up comedy Indonesia, joke techniques consists of paralanguage (which is used differently depend on the comic’s stage persona), ridicule (self ridicule, private ridicule, shared ridicule, and satire), power and politeness, and blue material; (2) the figurative languages strategy consists of wordplay (punning, mocking, banter and sarcasm), and hyperbole; (3) linguistics features of joke telling include repetition, pauses (long/short pauses), discourse markers; and (4) there are new humor strategies found in the study, those are simile and metonymy (in figurative languages) and the performance imperfection of English-speaking Indonesian comics which turn as their strength covering the code shifting, false translation, and the bold (or meddhok) accent (in linguistic features of joke telling).

Keywords: Humor Strategies, Joke Techniques, Figurative Languages, Linguistic Features of Joke Telling, Stand Up Comedy Indonesia

judul: MARY BETH’S ANXIETY IN ANNA QUINDLEN’S EVERY LAST ONE
“PENERAPAN SHARIA MARKETING MIX  DALAM MENINGKATKAN VOLUME PENGGUNA JASA TRAVEL HAJI DAN UMRAH DI PT ESQ TOURS TRAVEL”
abstrak id:
ABSTRAK
Penelitian ini akan membahas tentang penerapan sharia marketing mix dalam meningkatkan volume pengguna jasa travel haji dan umrah (studi kasusu pada biro perjalanan haji dan umrah PT. ESQ Tours Travel). Fokus Permasalahan yang akan dibahas adalah ; (1) Bagaimakah penerapan sharia marketing mix yang dilakukan oleh PT. ESQ Tours Travel, (2) Bagaimanakah penerapan sharia marketing mix dalam meningkatkan volume pengguna jasa travel haji dan umrah di PT. ESQ Tours Travel. 
Penelitian ini dilakukan dengan menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif yaitu metode penelitian kualitatif analisis deskripsi. Penelitian kualitatif adalah suatu penelitian yang ditujukan untuk mendeskripsikan dan menganalisis fenomena, peristiwa, aktifitas social, sikap, kepercayaan, persepsi, pemikiran orang secara individual maupun kelompok. Sehingga dalam teknik penggalian data peneliti menggunakan metode observasi, wawancara mendalam, dan dokumentasi. Dari metode penelitian kualitatif deskriptif maka peneliti bisa melihat proses penerapan sharia marketing mix di PT. ESQ Tours Travel
Berdasarkan hasil penelitian disimpulkan bahwa PT. ESQ Tours Travel menerapkan sharia marketing mix dengan sangat baik. Hal tersebut bisa dilihat dari cara penyajian produk (produck) layanan umrah yang yang jelas dan transparan, meninggalkan perang harga (price) tapi berlomba dalam memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik, menggunakan kantor sendiri sebagai / tempat (place) pemasaran dan bebas ghasab, melakukan promosi (promotion) sesuai syar’i dengan pelayanan yang prima agar jamaah mendapatkan kepuasan melaksanakan unrah bersama PT. ESQ Tours Travel. Volume jamaah umrah ESQ semakin meningkat dalam setiap tahunnya hingga 19.99 %.

Kata Kunci : Sharia Marketing Mix, Volume, Peningkatan Jamaah Umrah
abstrak en:
ABSTRACT
This research is going to discuss about the application of Sharia marketing mix in increasing the volume of the users of Hajj and Umrah travel service (retrospective case series study on Hajj and Umrah travel agency of PT. ESQ Tours Travel). The focus Issues will be discussed below; (1) How is the application of Sharia marketing mix made by PT. ESQ Tours Travel, (2) How is the application of Sharia marketing mix increasing the volume of the users of Hajj and Umrah travel service in PT. ESQ Tours Travel.
This research was conducted by using a qualitative approach, qualitative research methods of descriptive analysis. Qualitative research is a study which is aimed to describe and analyze the phenomena, about social activities, attitudes, beliefs, perceptions, and thoughts of individual or collective people. So that, in the data deepening techniques the researchers used the observation method, in-depth interviews, and documentation of descriptive qualitative research method, the researcher can observe the process of applying sharia marketing mix in PT. ESQ Tours Travel.
Based on the results of the research it can be concluded that the PT. ESQ Tours Travel implements sharia marketing mix is very well. It can be seen from the way of the umrah service product presentation (production) that is clear and transparent, then leaving the price war (price) but it competes to provide the best service, then using its own office as marketing place (place) and free from ghasab, then promotion (promotion) according to sharia with excellent service, in order pilgrims to get satisfaction from carrying umrah by using PT. ESQ Tours Travel. ESQ Umrah pilgrim volume is more and more increasing every year up to 19.99%.
Keywords: Sharia Marketing Mix, Volume, Umrah pilgrims Improvement, PT. ESQ Tours Travel

judul: Pengaruh Biaya Ijarah, Prosedur Pencairan dan Pelayanan Terhadap Minat Nasabah dalam Menggadaikan Emas di PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan
abstrak id:
Penelitian yang berjudul pengaruh biaya ijarah, prosedur pencairan dan pelayanan terhadap minat nasabah dalam menggadaikan emas di PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan yang di latar belakangi oleh keinginan untuk mengetahui bagaimana pengaruh biaya ijarah, prosedur pencairan dan pelayanan terhadap minat nasabah dalam menggadaikan emas di PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan. Jenis penelitian ini adalah penelitian kuantitatif. Penelitian kuantitatif dapat diartikan sebagai metode penelitian yang berlandaskan pada filsafat positivisme, digunakan untuk meneliti pada populasi atau sampel tertentu, teknik pengambilan sampel biasanya random, pengumpulan data menggunakan instrumen penelitian, analisis data bersifat kuantitatif/statistik dengan tujuan untuk menguji hipotesis yang telah ditetapkan. Populasi dalam penelitian ini meliputi semua nasabah yang menggunakan produk gadai emas syariah PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan. Sedangkan sampel nasabah yang diambil adalah 100 nasabah yang pernah melakukan gadai emas di PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan. Pemilihan sampel penelitian dilakukan dengan purposive sampling. Data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah data primer, karena data didapat secara langsung dari nasabah melalui pembagian kuesioner. Metode analisis data yang digunakan adalah analisis kuantitatif dengan menggunakan uji validitas dan uji reliabilitas, uji asumsi klasik, uji F, uji t dan analisis regresi linier berganda. Hasil pengujian menunjukkan secara simultan ketiga variabel independen, yaitu biaya ijarah, prosedur pencairan dan pelayanan berpengaruh signifikan terhadap variabel dependen, yaitu minat nasabah dalam menggadaikan emas di PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan. Dari hasil uji parsial, menunjukkan bahwa variabel biaya ijarah dan prosedur pencairan tidak berpengaruh signifikan terhadap minat nasabah dalam menggadaikan emas di PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan sementara yang berpengaruh signifikan terhadap minat nasabah dalam menggadaikan emas di PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan adalah variabel pelayanan.

Kata kunci : biaya ijarah, prosedur pencairan, pelayanan dan minat.
abstrak en:
The research is entitled the impact of ijarah costs, disbursement procedures and services to the customer interest of gold pawn in PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan. This research purposes to know the impact of ijarah costs, disbursement procedures and services to the customer interest of gold pawn in PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan.
This research is quantitative research. Quantitative research was interpreted as a research method that is based on the philosophy of positivism, it is used to examine the population or a particular sample with random sampling technique, data collection using research instruments, data analysis belong to quantitative / statistics type to test the hypothesis that has been set. The population in this research included all customers who use the products of gold pawn in PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan. Samples are taken from 100 customers who had done a gold pawn activities in PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan. The Selection of the sample is based on purposive sampling. This research use primary data, it is obtained directly from customers by questionnaires distribution. Quantitative analysis is done by validity and reliability test, the classical assumption test, F test, t test and multiple linear regression analysis.
The result of this research shows that three independent variables, such as ijarah costs, disbursement procedures and services have a significant impact on the dependent variable simultaneously to the customers interest of gold pawn in PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan. The result of partial test shows that the variable ijarah costs and disbursement procedure does not give impact significantly to the customers interest of gold pawn in PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan. While, variable services has significantly impact to the customers interest of gold pawn in PT. BRI Syariah KCP Bangkalan.

Keywords : ijarah costs, disbursement procedures, services and interests.

judul:
TINJAUAN EKONOMI ISLAM TERHADAP PENGUPAHAN KARYAWAN PADA KONVEKSI STAR NINE Group
Studi Kasus pada Konveksi Star Nine Group
Desa Tritunggal Babat Lamongan Jawa Timur
abstrak id:
Penelitian ini akan membahas tentang tinjauan Ekonomi Islam terhadap praktek pengupahan karyawan konveksi Star Nine Group (Studi Kasus pada konveksi Star Nine Group Desa Tritunggal Babat Lamongan). Fokus permasalahan yang akan dibahas adalah: (1) Bagaimana praktik pengupahan karyawan yang dilakukan konveksi Star Nine Group, (2) Bagaimana pengupahan karyawan konveksi Star Nine Group dalam tinjauan Ekonomi Islam.
Penelitian ini dilakukan dengan menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data yang dilakukan adalah melalui observasi langsung ke lapangan, wawancara dengan pemilik perusahaan dan karyawan serta menggunakan cara dokumentasi dengan memanfaatkan data-data dan dokumen perusahaan.
Berdasarkan hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa hampir sebagin besar praktik pengupahan karyawan pada konveksi Star Nine Group belum sesuai dengan konsep Ekonomi Islam, karena jika dikaji dari sisi kontrak kerja yang hanya disepakati secara lisan sehingga tidak mempunyai legalitas hukum yang kuat, proses penentuan upah belum dilakukan secara objektif dan subjektif, upah yang diberikan belum sesuai dengan prinsip keadilan dan kelayakan pengupahan Islami, serta adanya unsur ketidakadilan dalam pemenuhan hak karyawan.


Kata Kunci: Upah, Upah dalam Perspektif Ekonomi Islam.
abstrak en:
This research will discuss the Islamic Economic review of the practice of employee remuneration convection Star Nine Group (Case Study on convection Star Nine Group Desa Tritunggal Babat Lamongan Jawa Timur) . Focus issues to be discussed are : (1) How do employees remuneration practices convection Star Nine Group , (2) How the remuneration of employees convection Star Nine Group in reviews Islamic Economics .
This research was conducted by using a qualitative approach . Data collection techniques is done through direct observation to the field , interviews with business owners and employees and use the documentation by using the data and documents of the company.
Based on the results of the study showed that nearly most of his employees on remuneration practices convection Star Nine Group is not in accordance with the concept of Islamic Economics, because when examined in terms of the employment contract which only agreed verbally that does not have a strong legality, the process of wage determination has not been made objectively and subjectively, given wages not in accordance with the principles of fairness and feasibility of Islamic wages, as well as the element of injustice in the fulfillment of the rights of employees .


Keywords : Wages , Wage in Islamic Economic Perspective

judul: Pengaruh Pembiayaan Murabahah terhadap Pemberdayaan Usaha Ekonomi Mikro (Study Kasus Koperasi BMT-Maslahah Cabang Pabean Surabaya)
abstrak id:
Penelitian yang berjudul pengaruh pembiayaan Murabahah terhadap pemberdayaan usaha ekonomi mikro pada Koperasi BMT-Maslahah Cabang Pabean Surabaya yang di latar belakangi oleh keinginan untuk mengetahui bagaimana profil usaha mikro yang menjadi nasabah pembiayaan Murabahah dan Bagaimana pengaruh pembiayaan Murabahah terhadap pemberdayaan usaha ekonomi mikro pada Koperasi BMT-Maslahah Cabang Pabean Surabaya.
Jenis penelitian ini adalah penelitian kuantitatif. Penelitian kuantitatif dapat diartikan sebagai metode penelitian yang berlandaskan pada filsafat positivisme, digunakan untuk meneliti pada populasi atau sampel tertentu, teknik pengambilan sampel biasanya random, pengumpulan data menggunakan instrumen penelitian, analisis data bersifat kuantitatif/statistik dengan tujuan untuk menguji hipotesis yang telah ditetapkan. Populasi dalam penelitian ini meliputi nasabah yang memiliki usaha mikro dan mendapatkan pembiayaan Murabahah pada Koperasi BMT-Maslahah Cabang Pabean Surabaya. Sedangkan sampel nasabah yang diambil sebanyak 58 responden, jumlah tersebut diambil dari 50% jumlah populasi yaitu 116 responden. Pemilihan sampel penelitian dilakukan dengan purposive sampling. Data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah data primer dan data sekunder. Metode analisis data yang digunakan adalah analisis kuantitatif dengan menggunakan uji validitas dan uji reliabilitas, uji asumsi klasik, uji F, uji t dan analisis regresi linier sederhana.
Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa usaha mikro ini dimiliki oleh orang-perorangan, tidak berbentuk badan hukum dan juga belum memiliki surat ijin usaha resmi dari dinas terkait, usaha yang masih tergolong relatif rendah akan modal yang tersedia dan hasil pengujian mmenunjukkan bahwa pembiayaan Murabahah berpengaruh signifikan terhadap variabel dependen, yaitu pemberdayaan usaha ekonomi mikro pada Koperasi BMT-Maslahah Cabang Pabean Surabaya. Dari hasil Uji T, menunjukkan bahwa nilai t hitung (9,979) > nilai t tabel (1,672) dan H0 ditolak. Jadi terdapat pengaruh signifikan antara variabel pembiayaan Murabahah terhadap pemberdayaan usaha ekonomi mikro pada Koperasi BMT-Maslahah Cabang Pabean Surabaya.

Kata kunci : Pembiayaan Murabahah, Pemberdayaan dan Usaha Ekonomi Mikro.
abstrak en:
